name: An Apple a Day (Dippy0615, Mr Scotsman)
name_original: An Apple a Day (Dippy0615, Mr Scotsman)
description:
What is this?

A game based on the Nokia 3310 phones that is about collecting apples as a frog and avoid pests, keep track of your time and health as doing nothing can cost you an attempt so be careful!

Controls

Here are the controls for the game, pretty simple since it's only 7 buttons:

ButtonKeyNumpad KeyLeftLeft arrow keyNumpad 4RightRight arrow keyNumpad 6UpUp arrow keyNumpad 8DownDown arrow keyNumpad 2Menu Select/JumpZNumpad 5Menu Return/PunchXNumpad 1PauseEnterNumpad 0 Credits

Dippy - https://twitter.com/Dippy0615
    • Co-creator
    • Programmer

Made for the Nokia 3310 Jam.
